item.title: About
item.description: Ikigai: A reason for being. A reason for doing or accomplishing! Briefly: We are a small team who help in the following phases of realizing your goal: Planning your experiment so that it makes scientific sense. This includes suggesting you an apt approach to derive the best possible outcome. Execution of your requisite analyses and help you answer the questions posed by you. Sharing the knowledge with the greater scientific world, for the betterment of Humanity.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are currently implementing a contact form for this page. However feel free to drop an email to : ikigaiinformatics@gmail.com with the following details so that we can reach you easily: Your name, so that we can address you Your email address, so as to reach you Your phone number, so that we can converse about your project A short text to know about your study, so that we can be prepared to aid you

item.title: Services
item.description: We offer the following services at Ikigai Informatics: Genome Survey analyses: Knowledge creation for information sparse organisms DNASeq with a Reference Genome: Contrast your sample with an available resource using Genome Sequencing Exome mutation analyses: Explore variation in the Protein Coding regions of a gene in a genome. Eukaryotic Genome assembly and analyses: Develop resource for a Eukaryotic organism using an assembly by mining features.
